properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

identity.description: The managed service identities assigned to this resource.

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

provisioningState.description: The status of the last operation.

discovery.description: Configure to automatically discover entities from a given scope, such as a Service Group. The discovered entities will be linked to the root entity of the health model.

scope.description: The scope from which entities should be automatically discovered. For example, the resource id of a Service Group.

addRecommendedSignals.description: Whether to add all recommended signals to the discovered entities.

identity.description: Which Managed Identity of the health model to use for discovery. Defaults to SystemAssigned, if not set. Can be set to 'SystemAssigned' or to the resource id of a user-assigned managed identity which is linked to the health model.

principalId.description: The service principal ID of the system assigned identity. This property will only be provided for a system assigned identity.

tenantId.description: The tenant ID of the system assigned identity. This property will only be provided for a system assigned identity.

type.description: Type of managed service identity (where both SystemAssigned and UserAssigned types are allowed).

userAssignedIdentities.description: The set of user assigned identities associated with the resource. The userAssignedIdentities dictionary keys will be ARM resource ids in the form: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/{identityName}. The dictionary values can be empty objects ({}) in requests.

principalId.description: The principal ID of the assigned identity.

clientId.description: The client ID of the assigned identity.

createdBy.description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

provisioningState.description: The status of the last operation.

managedIdentityName.description: Name of the managed identity to use. Either 'SystemAssigned' or the resourceId of a user-assigned identity.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

provisioningState.description: The status of the last operation.

authenticationSetting.description: Reference to the name of the authentication setting which is used for querying Azure Resource Graph. The same authentication setting will also be assigned to any discovered entities.

discoverRelationships.description: Whether to create relationships between the discovered entities based on a set of built-in rules. These relationships cannot be manually deleted.

addRecommendedSignals.description: Whether to add all recommended signals to the discovered entities.

specification.description: Specification of the discovery rule defining how entities are discovered.

deletionDate.description: Date when the discovery rule was (soft-)deleted.

error.description: Error details if the last discovery operation failed.

entityName.description: Name of the entity which represents the discovery rule. Note: It might take a few minutes after creating the discovery rule until the entity is created.

kind.description: Kind of the discovery rule specification

resourceGraphQuery.description: Azure Resource Graph query text in KQL syntax. The query must return at least a column named 'id' which contains the resource ID of the discovered resources.

kind.description: Kind of the discovery rule specification

context.description: Additional context information, like resource IDs or query details

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

provisioningState.description: The status of the last operation.

canvasPosition.description: Positioning of the entity on the model canvas

icon.description: Visual icon definition. If not set, a default icon is used.

healthObjective.description: Health objective as a percentage of time the entity should be healthy.

impact.description: Impact of the entity in health state propagation

signalGroups.description: Signal groups which are assigned to this entity

discoveredBy.description: Discovered by which discovery rule. If set, the entity cannot be deleted manually.

iconName.description: Name of the built-in icon, or 'Custom' to use customData

customData.description: Custom data. Base64-encoded SVG data. If set, this overrides the built-in icon.

dependencies.description: Settings for dependency signals to control how the health state of child entities influences the health state of the parent entity.

authenticationSetting.description: Reference to the name of the authentication setting which is used for querying the data source.

azureResourceKind.description: Azure resource kind (e.g., 'functionapp'). Populated by the UI for icon rendering. Can be null if not populated.

timeGrain.description: Time range of signal. ISO duration format like PT10M.

aggregationType.description: Type of aggregation to apply to the metric

dimensionFilter.description: Optional: Dimension filter to apply to the dimension. Must only be set if also Dimension is set.

refreshInterval.description: Interval in which the signal is being evaluated. Defaults to PT1M (1 minute).

dataUnit.description: Unit of the signal result (e.g. Bytes, MilliSeconds, Percent, Count))

evaluationRules.description: Evaluation rules for the signal definition

name.description: Unique name of the signal within the entity.

signalDefinitionName.description: Optional reference to a signal definition that provides default values.

operator.description: Operator how to compare the signal value with the threshold

reportedAt.description: Timestamp when the value was reported

error.description: Error message if the signal status cannot be retrieved

authenticationSetting.description: Reference to the name of the authentication setting which is used for querying the data source.

timeGrain.description: Time range of signal. ISO duration format like PT10M. If not specified, the KQL query must define a time range.

valueColumnName.description: Name of the column in the result set to evaluate against the thresholds. Defaults to the first column in the result set if not specified. The column must be numeric.

refreshInterval.description: Interval in which the signal is being evaluated. Defaults to PT1M (1 minute).

dataUnit.description: Unit of the signal result (e.g. Bytes, MilliSeconds, Percent, Count))

evaluationRules.description: Evaluation rules for the signal definition

name.description: Unique name of the signal within the entity.

signalDefinitionName.description: Optional reference to a signal definition that provides default values.

authenticationSetting.description: Reference to the name of the authentication setting which is used for querying the data source.

signals.description: Signals assigned to this signal group.

timeGrain.description: Time range of signal. ISO duration format like PT10M.

refreshInterval.description: Interval in which the signal is being evaluated. Defaults to PT1M (1 minute).

dataUnit.description: Unit of the signal result (e.g. Bytes, MilliSeconds, Percent, Count))

evaluationRules.description: Evaluation rules for the signal definition

name.description: Unique name of the signal within the entity.

signalDefinitionName.description: Optional reference to a signal definition that provides default values.

degradedThreshold.description: Degraded threshold for aggregating the propagated health state of child dependencies. Can be either an absolute number that is greater than 0, or a percentage between 1-100%. The entity will be considered degraded when the number of not healthy child dependents (unhealthy, degraded, unknown) is equal to or above the threshold value. Must only be set when AggregationType is 'Thresholds'.

unhealthyThreshold.description: Unhealthy threshold for aggregating the propagated health state of child dependencies. Can be either an absolute number that is greater than 0, or a percentage between 1-100%. The entity will be considered unhealthy when the number of not healthy child dependents (unhealthy, degraded, unknown) is equal to or above the threshold value. Must only be set when AggregationType is 'Thresholds'.

unhealthy.description: Alert to be triggered on state change to unhealthy

degraded.description: Alert to be triggered on state change to degraded

actionGroupIds.description: Optional list of action group resource IDs to be notified when the alert is triggered.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

provisioningState.description: The status of the last operation.

parentEntityName.description: Resource name of the parent entity

childEntityName.description: Resource name of the child entity

discoveredBy.description: Discovered by which discovery rule. If set, the relationship cannot be deleted manually.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

provisioningState.description: The status of the last operation.

refreshInterval.description: Interval in which the signal is being evaluated. Defaults to PT1M (1 minute).

dataUnit.description: Unit of the signal result (e.g. Bytes, MilliSeconds, Percent, Count))

evaluationRules.description: Evaluation rules for the signal definition

deletionDate.description: Date when the signal definition was (soft-)deleted

timeGrain.description: Time range of signal. ISO duration format like PT10M.

aggregationType.description: Type of aggregation to apply to the metric

dimensionFilter.description: Optional: Dimension filter to apply to the dimension. Must only be set if also Dimension is set.

timeGrain.description: Time range of signal. ISO duration format like PT10M. If not specified, the KQL query must define a time range.

valueColumnName.description: Name of the column in the result set to evaluate against the thresholds. Defaults to the first column in the result set if not specified. The column must be numeric.

timeGrain.description: Time range of signal. ISO duration format like PT10M.

startAt.description: Start time for the history query. Defaults to 24 hours ago if not specified.

endAt.description: End time for the history query. Defaults to now if not specified.

previousState.description: Previous health state before the transition

newState.description: New health state after the transition

signalName.description: Name of the signal to get history for

startAt.description: Start time for the history query. Defaults to 24 hours ago if not specified.

endAt.description: End time for the history query. Defaults to now if not specified.

value.description: Signal value at this point in time

healthState.description: Health state at this point in time

additionalContext.description: Additional context as provided by the submitter

signalName.description: Name of the entity signal to report health for

healthState.description: Health state to report for the signal

evaluationRules.description: Evaluation rules that were used to determine the reported health state

expiresIn.description: Number of minutes until the health report expires. Defaults to 60 (1 hour) if not specified.

additionalContext.description: Optional additional context or description for the health report
